verses.verse: לְֽ֭תַאֲוָה <WH8378> Through desire יְבַקֵּ֣שׁ <WH1245> himself seeketh נִפְרָ֑ד <WH6504> a man having separated בְּכָל־ <WH3605> all תּ֝וּשִׁיָּ֗ה <WH8454> with all wisdom יִתְגַּלָּֽע׃ <WH1566> [and] intermeddleth

לֹֽא־ <WH3808> does not יַחְפֹּ֣ץ <WH2654> hath no delight כְּ֭סִיל <WH3684> A fool בִּתְבוּנָ֑ה <WH8394> in understanding כִּ֝֗י <WH3588> But אִֽם־ <WH518> only בְּהִתְגַּלּ֥וֹת <WH1540> may discover לִבּֽוֹ׃ <WH3820> but that his heart

בְּֽבוֹא־ <WH935> cometh רָ֭שָׁע <WH7563> When the wicked בָּ֣א <WH935> [then] cometh גַם־ <WH1571> also בּ֑וּז <WH937> also contempt וְֽעִם־ <WH5973> and with קָל֥וֹן <WH7036> and with ignominy חֶרְפָּֽה׃ <WH2781> reproach

מַ֣יִם <WH4325> waters עֲ֭מֻקִּים <WH6013> [are as] deep דִּבְרֵ֣י <WH1697> The words פִי־ <WH6310> mouth אִ֑ישׁ <WH376> of a man's נַ֥חַל <WH5158> brook נֹ֝בֵ֗עַ <WH5042> [as] a flowing מְק֣וֹר <WH4726> [and] the wellspring חָכְמָֽה׃ <WH2451> of wisdom

שְׂאֵ֣ת <WH5375> to accept פְּנֵי־ <WH6440> the person רָשָׁ֣ע <WH7563> of the wicked לֹא־ <WH3808> is not ט֑וֹב <WH2896> [It is] not good לְהַטּ֥וֹת <WH5186> to overthrow צַ֝דִּ֗יק <WH6662> the righteous בַּמִּשְׁפָּֽט׃ <WH4941> in judgment

שִׂפְתֵ֣י <WH8193> lips כְ֭סִיל <WH3684> A fool's יָבֹ֣אֽוּ <WH935> enter בְרִ֑יב <WH7379> into contention וּ֝פִ֗יו <WH6310> and his mouth לְֽמַהֲלֻמ֥וֹת <WH4112> for strokes יִקְרָֽא׃ <WH7121> calleth
פִּֽי־ <WH6310> mouth כְ֭סִיל <WH3684> A fool's מְחִתָּה־ <WH4288> [is] his destruction ל֑וֹ וּ֝שְׂפָתָ֗יו <WH8193> and his lips מוֹקֵ֥שׁ <WH4170> [are] the snare נַפְשֽׁוֹ׃ <WH5315> of his soul

דִּבְרֵ֣י <WH1697> The words נִ֭רְגָּן <WH5372> of a talebearer כְּמִֽתְלַהֲמִ֑ים <WH3859> [are] as wounds וְ֝הֵ֗ם <WH1992> and they יָרְד֥וּ <WH3381> and they go down חַדְרֵי־ <WH2315> into the innermost parts בָֽטֶן׃ <WH990> of the belly

גַּ֭ם <WH1571> also מִתְרַפֶּ֣ה <WH7503> He also that is slothful בִמְלַאכְתּ֑וֹ <WH4399> in his work אָ֥ח <WH251> is brother ה֝֗וּא <WH1931> he לְבַ֣עַל <WH1167> to him that is a great מַשְׁחִֽית׃ <WH7843> waster

מִגְדַּל־ <WH4026> tower עֹ֭ז <WH5797> [is] a strong שֵׁ֣ם <WH8034> The name יְהוָ֑ה <WH3069> God בּֽוֹ־ יָר֖וּץ <WH7323> runneth צַדִּ֣יק <WH6662> the righteous וְנִשְׂגָּֽב׃ <WH7682> into it and is safe

ה֣וֹן <WH1952> wealth עָ֭שִׁיר <WH6223> The rich man's קִרְיַ֣ת <WH7151> city עֻזּ֑וֹ <WH5797> [is] his strong וּכְחוֹמָ֥ה <WH2346> wall נִ֝שְׂגָּבָ֗ה <WH7682> and as an high בְּמַשְׂכִּיתֽוֹ׃ <WH4906> in his own conceit

לִפְנֵי־ <WH6440> Before שֶׁ֭בֶר <WH7667> destruction יִגְבַּ֣הּ <WH1361> is haughty לֵב־ <WH3820> the heart אִ֑ישׁ <WH376> of man וְלִפְנֵ֖י <WH6440> and before כָב֣וֹד <WH3519> honour עֲנָוָֽה׃ <WH6038> [is] humility

מֵשִׁ֣יב <WH7725> He that answereth דָּ֭בָר <WH1697> a matter בְּטֶ֣רֶם <WH2962> before יִשְׁמָ֑ע <WH8085> before he heareth אִוֶּ֥לֶת <WH200> [it] it [is] folly הִיא־ <WH1931> he ל֝֗וֹ וּכְלִמָּֽה׃ <WH3639> and shame

רֽוּחַ־ <WH7307> The spirit אִ֭ישׁ <WH376> of a man יְכַלְכֵּ֣ל <WH3557> will sustain מַחֲלֵ֑הוּ <WH4245> his infirmity וְר֥וּחַ <WH7307> spirit נְ֝כֵאָ֗ה <WH5218> but a wounded מִ֣י <WH4310> who יִשָּׂאֶֽנָּה׃ <WH5375> who can bear

לֵ֣ב <WH3820> The heart נָ֭בוֹן <WH995> of the prudent יִקְנֶה־ <WH7069> getteth דָּ֑עַת <WH1847> knowledge וְאֹ֥זֶן <WH241> and the ear חֲ֝כָמִ֗ים <WH2450> of the wise תְּבַקֶּשׁ־ <WH1245> seeketh דָּֽעַת׃ <WH1847> knowledge
מַתָּ֣ן <WH4976> gift אָ֭דָם <WH120> A man's יַרְחִ֣יב <WH7337> maketh room ל֑וֹ וְלִפְנֵ֖י <WH6440> him before גְדֹלִ֣ים <WH1419> great men יַנְחֶֽנּוּ׃ <WH5148> for him and bringeth
צַדִּ֣יק <WH6662> [seemeth] just הָרִאשׁ֣וֹן <WH7223> [He that is] first בְּרִיב֑וֹ <WH7379> in his own cause [יָבֹא־ כ] (וּבָֽא־ <WH935> comes ק) <WH935> comes וַחֲקָרֽוֹ׃ <WH2713> and searcheth
מִ֭דְיָנִים <WH4079> causeth contentions יַשְׁבִּ֣ית <WH7673> to cease הַגּוֹרָ֑ל <WH1486> The lot וּבֵ֖ין <WH996> between עֲצוּמִ֣ים <WH6099> between the mighty יַפְרִֽיד׃ <WH6504> and parteth

אָ֗ח <WH251> A brother נִפְשָׁ֥ע <WH6586> offended מִקִּרְיַת־ <WH7151> city עֹ֑ז <WH5797> [is harder to be won] than a strong [וּמְדֹונִים כ] (וּ֝מִדְיָנִ֗ים <WH4066> brawling ק) כִּבְרִ֥יחַ <WH1280> [are] like the bars אַרְמֽוֹן׃ <WH759> of a castle

מִפְּרִ֣י <WH6529> with the fruit פִי־ <WH6310> of his mouth אִ֭ישׁ <WH376> A man's תִּשְׂבַּ֣ע <WH7646> shall be satisfied בִּטְנ֑וֹ <WH990> belly תְּבוּאַ֖ת <WH8393> [and] with the increase שְׂפָתָ֣יו <WH8193> of his lips יִשְׂבָּֽע׃ <WH7646> shall he be filled

מָ֣וֶת <WH4194> Death וְ֭חַיִּים <WH2416> and life בְּיַד־ <WH3027> [are] in the power לָשׁ֑וֹן <WH3956> of the tongue וְ֝אֹהֲבֶ֗יהָ <WH157> and they that love יֹאכַ֥ל <WH398> it shall eat פִּרְיָֽהּ׃ <WH6529> the fruit
מָצָ֣א <WH4672> [Whoso] findeth אִ֭שָּׁה <WH802> a wife מָ֣צָא <WH4672> findeth ט֑וֹב <WH2896> a good וַיָּ֥פֶק <WH6329> [thing] and obtaineth רָ֝צ֗וֹן <WH7522> favour מֵיְהוָֽה׃ <WH3068> of the LORD
תַּחֲנוּנִ֥ים <WH8469> intreaties יְדַבֶּר־ <WH1696> useth רָ֑שׁ <WH7326> The poor וְ֝עָשִׁ֗יר <WH6223> but the rich יַעֲנֶ֥ה <WH6030> answereth עַזּֽוֹת׃ <WH5794> roughly

אִ֣ישׁ <WH376> A man רֵ֭עִים <WH7453> [that hath] friends לְהִתְרֹעֵ֑עַ <WH7489> must shew himself friendly וְיֵ֥שׁ <WH3426> and there is אֹ֝הֵ֗ב <WH157> a friend דָּבֵ֥ק <WH1695> [that] sticketh closer מֵאָֽח׃ <WH251> than a brother
